name: Dash'n Cheat!
description:
HOW TO PLAY-

RMB - DASH

LMB - SHOOT

Team:

DEVELOPERS: ANIL AKHAN - FURKAN DOGAN

2D-3D ART: ESIN YILMAZ

VFX and ANIMATION: FURKAN DOGAN

Voice-Over: ESIN YILMAZ

MUSIC and SFX: 
https://freesound.org

https://www.zapsplat.com

Doom Eternal OST - The Only Thing They Fear is You (Mick Gordon)

You just need to vibe around in the level and dodge the weird monsters around you AND don't ask about them. We also don't know why they are following you. Maybe they just want some food or something? Oh, you say they are attacking you? Just dodge them man, it's not worth trying and fighting... Hey.... You gonna fight... ? WAIT YOU STARTED SHOOTING THEM?? NO, NO, NO!!!  YOU ONLY HAVE 1 LIVE, RUN AWAY!!!


----
Well the point was about breaking the game rules and getting some powerups and extra lives but we could only implement the extra HP's that you were supposed to not have at all. Right now it's just a shooting game.
